officialTitle: Controlled, Multicenter, Randomized Parallel Group Pilot Study With 2 Treatment Arms in Non-pregnant Women With Acute Symptomatic Bacterial Vaginosis (BV)
inclusionCriteria:
* \> 18 years old
* Acute symptomatic BV
* Signed informed consent
* Must be FEMALE
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Insufficient knowledge of German
* Illiteracy
* Pregnancy
* Acute illness
* Known allergies against ingredients of the investigational products
